Description:
RENOVATED HOME MINUTES TO SHOPPING CENTRE
With the benefits of a recent extensive renovation, this low maintenance property has been redone in a modern clean style with no compromise. Buy for investment with nothing to be done or move in and make yourself at home, this property will surprise you. Features 3 good sized bedrooms all with BIR's, spacious lounge, kitchen/dining, bathroom with bath, vanity and separate shower. Ducted heating and cooling throughout. With all the hard work done you will reap the benefits with this fantastic home. Priced to sell, it is conveniently located within walking distance to the Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Bunnings & the variety of amenities that this growing area has to offer. Don't miss this one.

Description:
Dream parcel, so close to town.
On approx. 2.5 acres is this dream parcel of land, suitable for those looking to create their next home or lifestyle property (STCA).
The block is fenced on three sides, with the features and benefits of having town water, power, gas and sewer all available. Elevated with fantastic views, the block has a building envelope of 45m x 25m, giving you more than enough space to build your home, as well as a great sized shed, and all the added extras a family may desire, including play area and pool. Works already undertaken on the property include site cut for a large shed plus retaining walls.
Everything is at your fingertips with schools, shopping centres and the soon-to-be-completed Kangaroo Flat Aquatic centre all close by, as well as Crusoe Reservoir for recreational pursuits.
Melbourne is just a 90 minute drive away.
Call soon to make your dream a reality!
Insights: 21 Haase Road, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
WHAT A SURPISE PACKAGE!!
This surprisingly large family home of about 18sqs of living could be the buy of the century! With 3 living areas, 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets, solid fuel heater, zoned floor heating, ducted evaporative air-conditioning, 3 good sized bedrooms with built-in-robes, practical kitchen with pantry and dishwasher, study nook, and a huge covered outdoor entertaining area, it represents extremely good value. Sited on a block of about 600m2 in a quiet court, there's also the opportunity to purchase the adjacent vacant block of land at the rear of around 600m2 at 294 High Street. The block has all services available and a workshop of approximately 70m2 with concrete floor and power. Access is off the service road. Buy 1 or buy both at a great price!

Description:
Retiree downsizes dream!
Situated in a very tightly held pocket of Kangaroo Flat, 'Andrew Close' offers nine individual & separate townhouses. The common driveway space has visitor parking & car parking at each unit. With privacy maintained the comfort of having neighbours around you in a safe and secure position.
- Low maintenance living with the advantage of a nice yard for some garden.
- This is affordable retirement / investment living.
- The unit does requires some cosmetic updating to improve the appearance but the bones are noticeably solid for the age.
- So well-loved over the years, with floor plan providing a foundation for entertaining and open plan lounge.
- Vacant and ready to inspect ASAP.
Positioned close to shops, public transport, and Melbourne side of Bendigo.

Description:
A PLACE TO CALL HOME
Built just 6 years ago by JG King, this neat contemporary home provides the perfect floorplan to launch your real estate portfolio or to consider your living options.
Hosting stylish comforts and uncompromised quality, this home provides a flawless open plan living area, a deluxe kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry with direct service to the adjoining dining space.
This home is perfect if you like to entertain, with glass sliding doors connecting perfectly to the low maintenance garden.
The master bedroom incorporates a walk-in robe and ensuite, whilst the further two bedrooms with built in robes are accompanied by the bright and stylish family bathroom, a separate toilet and a central laundry.
Heating and cooling is provide efficiently with the ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout.
Located in Kangaroo Flat, just around the corner from Lansell Square shopping Centre.

Description:
TOP POSITION - SHED AND OUTDOOR LIVING!!
Affordable and in excellent order inside is this fantastic home on a spacious 674m2 allotment with a few extras you might not often see at this price.
Vehicle access to the yard, a 6m x 5m lock-up brick garage at rear of property with tilt door, power and attached carport to one side; plus a huge 5m x 12m approx. outdoor entertaining area are all part of the package. The home was refurbished approx 2003 so it is in quite good order; only needing some minor work externally.
There is a large lounge with gas heating, air conditioner and ceiling fan; adjacent is the large kitchen with stainless electric oven and gas hot plates, range hood, pantry and breakfast bar. All three bedrooms have ceiling fans and two have built in robes; the bathroom is modern with a separate bath, shower, basin and toilet; separate laundry with storage.
The outdoor area is paved and has views to the established back yard.
Set amongst leafy established trees and a lovely wide kerbside, and in a great position with easy access to Melbourne, a walk to the shops, schools and transport, and not too far from Bendigo. A really good all-round package ready for its new owners.
Insights: 46 Crusoe Road, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat & Tidy - Kangaroo Flat
Positioned directly opposite the state forest, this well maintained brick unit offers spacious living in a peaceful location.
A bus stop only a short stroll away, within walking distance to Lansell Plaza and only a short drive to central Kangaroo Flat, train station, shops, medical clinics and much more...
The property features:
- Two spacious bedrooms both with built in robes.
- Well-appointed kitchen with an updated free standing stove & hotplates, plus ample cupboard & bench space.
- Central bathroom with corner shower, bath, toilet & vanity unit.
- Spacious open plan lounge room leading through to a dining area.
- Gas heating and split system heating/cooling unit.
- Single garage with automatic roller door.
- Manageable back yard, with double gate vehicle access.
- This property has two driveway access points for vehicles allowing for a second parking area for trailer/caravan and alike.
A property has so much to offer, an inspection is a must... call now to arrange a time that suits you!
Insights: 1/22 Yarunga Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Liberty to Live Life to the Fullest
Seize the day! Sell your mower and purchase this terrific townhouse, liberating all that time spent on garden toil to start ticking off your bucket list. The ultimate in minimal maintenance, this is the ideal property to lock and leave for extended vacations. Therefore, investors, busy people working long hours and first home owners will also find that it has plenty to offer.
Situated in a well-settled area amongst other house-proud owners, it stands alone on its own title. An elevated position grants great views of tree-topped hills on the horizon to those enjoying a glass of wine or a cuppa, catching a cool summer breeze on the front verandah.
Generous open plan living has gas heating, reverse cycle air conditioning and ceiling fan to ensure constant comfort. Plenty of storage has been built-in, such as floor-to-ceiling robes in both bedrooms and loads of kitchen cabinetry where an abundance of bench surrounds a gas stove.
Extending the floorplan, a substantial undercover alfresco area is semi-enclosed by timber screens and cafe blinds creating a cosy, sheltered and private room. The single garage has the convenience of a remote-controlled roller door plus space for a workbench.
Close to bus stops for Bendigo and local shopping complex, it's just 5 minute walk to primary school and secondary college. Only 3 minute drive or 20 minute walk to a health centre and shopping precinct, it's not much more to catch a train to Melbourne and only 150 kilometres to the big smoke via the Calder Highway. Carpe diem!

Description:
Well Designed 3 Bedroom Townhouse
Perfectly positioned and within walking distance to Lansell Square shopping centre, is this well-designed and presented 3 bedroom duplex townhouse, offering many features and benefits to suit first home buyers, retirees or investors. The 9ft ceilings give a feeling of openness throughout, and all 3 bedrooms are of a good size and have built-in robes. 3x split systems control temperature for your year round comfort, and there is a walk-in linen closet in the passage.
The kitchen with all “A” class appliances, loads of bench space and cupboards, is part of the spacious open-plan meals and family area, which overlooks the low maintenance yard and undercover entertaining area.
A garden shed completes the neat exterior.
You will be able to sit around, relax and potter as much, or as less as you like.
Bus, schools and shops are all just a stone's throw away.

Description:
Grace and Style
This grand old lady has seen many decades but she still proudly shows off her period appeal, over shadowing all the neighbouring properties with her grace and style.Inside the home offers a mix of original charm with the essential necessities of 21st century living but leaves scope for her next owners to add their personal touches.
Property Features:
Decorative early 1900's facade with return veranda
Original polished timber flooring
Fabulous light filtering stained glass windows
Feature fire places in 3 rooms
Claw-foot bath and pedestal basin
2 carpeted bedrooms
Modern appointed kitchen
Central gas heating and evaporative cooling
Large covered outdoor entertainment area with wood fired pizza oven
Double garage
Spacious 1069sqm corner allotment
Opposite Kangaroo Flat Reserve
Short drive or walk to all Kangaroo Flat facilities

Description:
Lively and lovely - fully renovated home
Superbly renovated, this unique 3 bedroom home represents high quality and great value for money. A palet of beautiful vibrant colors combine & create a home that is both contemporary & creative whilst at the same time, catering for the general practicalities.
Features include; - Open plan kitchen dining area with a walk-in pantry, dishwasher and top of the range double oven - a living room with beautiful bamboo timber floors - 3 double bedrooms all with built in robes - modern bathroom with walk in shower and heated towel rails -ducted heating and cooling, 2 x split system a/c's and HRV central heating system keep the climate perfect all year round - an undercover outdoor area just off the dining room - a handy workshop - 559m2 fully fenced allotment with space for a caravan - single carport and a 2.5 Kw solar system to keep the power bills to a minimum. In an ideal location only minutes from shops, schools, parks, medical facilities, the new leisure centre and public transport. Call now to arrange your inspection before it's too late.

Description:
Will Suit a Multitude of Buyers - Be Quick!
Well maintained and on a spacious 840m2 (approx) allotment this brick veneer family home ticks a lot of boxes and will suit a multitude of buyers. Features include 4 bedrooms (or 3 and study), built in robes to bedroom two and three plus walk in robe to main, with access to the 2 way bathroom. The bathroom is huge and includes shower, bath and vanity. The front of the home includes an L-shaped living area with formal dining space, which flows through to the kitchen with an informal dining area. Other features include gas heating and ducted cooling. The kitchen has been updated and includes gas hotplates, electric wall oven, dishwasher and excellent storage. From the kitchen meals you step out onto the large undercover pergola/alfresco area which over looks the spacious back yard. The yard is a real surprise packet for these days and includes a 6x6m (approx) shed with power and concrete floor, plus a carport and easy access into the backyard, ideal for storing the caravan, boat or trailer. This home is situated in a handy location and will suit the first home buyer, retiree or family looking for a low maintenance, well kept brick veneer home with a great yard. Be quick, will not last!
